Text:
Thanks Swegin8r

Unfortunately it didnt work for me..I did all as per your instructions, and it seemed that i had registered the product successfully..However when i went to use it i got the message "Register Code is not correct.We strongly recommend that you copy/paste it"

Any suggestions??

Thanks

@lukenzac: I haven't experienced this myself, but other people have reported the same problem to me. It seems to work right for some people and not for others. 

I haven't been able to duplicate the problem, so I've not had a chance to fix it. Very sorry about that mate.
